headline: Ask HN: Please share your productivity and focus tips, hacks, mindsets, etc.
description:
I am looking for anything you do that helps you get stuff done, even stuff you are not passionate about. Although I've come across many useful tips here on HN, listed later, I still struggle. Some days I just can't code at all. probably got sleep apnea.

Some stuff that has helped me on good days

- light cardio first thing or in noon

- good sleep

- not being stuck at some code

- deadlines not created by me (but leads to burn out)

- working closely with other people (PM, fellow dev)

- being in flow, hitting trifecta of skills match + interest match + support match

- air circulation and quiet environment, coldish temperature, multiple places to sit/lay

- informal culture and small team

- no ambiguity

- no bad blood between me and mgmt/boss/company/teammates

- create 3 todo item list daily

What else? what's your morning routine?

I don't think it's even about passion, I had all intentions and passion when I was working on my own project, but I worked 10 hours a day for a week and then never could work on it again, ended up selling it for few grand mostly to not see it rot.

TLDR: Extremely low stamina/energy and procrastination
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 请分享你的生产力和专注力技巧、黑科技、思维方式等。
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 請分享你的生產力和專注力技巧、黑科技、思維方式等。
description_zh-Hans:
我正在寻找你所做的任何有助于你完成工作的事情，即使是你不热衷的事情。虽然我在HN这里遇到了很多有用的技巧，后面会列出，但我仍然在挣扎。有些时候，我根本无法编码。可能有睡眠呼吸暂停。

一些在好日子里对我有帮助的东西

- 第一件事或在中午做轻度有氧运动

- 良好的睡眠

- 不拘泥于某些代码

- 不是由我创造的最后期限（但会导致倦怠）

- 与其他人密切合作（PM，开发伙伴）

- 处于流动状态。达到技能匹配+兴趣匹配+支持匹配的三要素

- 空气流通和安静的环境，温度偏低，有多个地方可以坐/躺

- 非正式的文化和小团队

- 没有歧义

- 我和mgmt/boss/company/teammates之间没有恶意

- 每天创建3个todo项目列表

还有什么？

我认为这甚至与激情无关，当我在做自己的项目时，我有所有的意图和激情，但我每天工作10小时，持续一周，然后再也无法工作，最后以几千美元的价格卖掉，主要是为了不看到它腐烂。

TLDR：极低的耐力/能量和拖延
